0.text: Innate: Xin Zhao's basic attacks and  Wind Becomes Lightning strikes generate a stack of Determination, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 15 / 30 / 45 / 60% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage and  heal Xin Zhao for 6 − 74 (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 65% AP).
0.html: Innate: Xin Zhao's basic attacks and Wind Becomes Lightning strikes generate a stack of Determination, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 15 / 30 / 45 / 60% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage and heal Xin Zhao for 6 − 74 (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 65% AP).

15 / 30 / 45 / 60% (based on level) AD
heal

0.text: Active: Xin Zhao empowers his next three basic attacks on-attack to each have an  uncancellable windup, deal bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities'  current cooldowns by 1 second. Each attack refreshes the duration.
0.html: Active: Xin Zhao empowers his next three basic attacks on-attack to each have an uncancellable windup, deal bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities'  current cooldowns by 1 second. Each attack refreshes the duration.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
current cooldowns

1.text: The third attack  knocks up the target for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: The third attack knocks up the target for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: knocks up

2.text: Three Talon Strike's bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html: Three Talon Strike's bonus damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: critical strike

3.text: Three Talon Strike  resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer.
3.html: Three Talon Strike resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Three Talon Strike  resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer.

0.text:
Active: Xin Zhao slashes in an arc and, after the cast time, thrusts his spear in a line in the target direction. Each strike deals physical damage to enemies hit, modified to 50% − 100% (based on level) against  minions.
The thrust deals increased damage, further by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance), and  slows enemies hit by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Enemy  champions and  monsters hit are also marked Challenged for 3 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
0.html:
Active: Xin Zhao slashes in an arc and, after the cast time, thrusts his spear in a line in the target direction. Each strike deals physical damage to enemies hit, modified to 50% − 100% (based on level) against minions.

The thrust deals increased damage, further by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance), and slows enemies hit by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Enemy champions and monsters hit are also marked Challenged for 3 seconds, during which they are revealed.

1.text: The durations of  Three Talon Strike,  Audacious Charge's bonus attack speed, and  Crescent Guard are delayed relative to Wind Becomes Lightning's cast time after 0.2 seconds of its activation.

life steal

0.text: Active: Xin Zhao  dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to enemies near them and  slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Audacious Charge's range is increased against Challenged targets.
0.html: Active: Xin Zhao dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to enemies near them and slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Audacious Charge's range is increased against Challenged targets.

0.text: Passive - Challenge: The last enemy champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or  Audacious Charge is marked Challenged for 3 seconds.

markedPassages: Audacious Charge

1.text: Active: Xin Zhao sweeps his spear around him, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, capped at 600 against  monsters, and  knocking back all non-Challenged targets hit up-to 700 units over 0.75 seconds, as well as  stunning them for the same duration.
1.html: Active: Xin Zhao sweeps his spear around him, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, capped at 600 against monsters, and knocking back all non-Challenged targets hit up-to 700 units over 0.75 seconds, as well as stunning them for the same duration.
